main_a1: Taste of a Real Natural Nutritious Burger
main_a3: And big diversity of street food
main_prebutton: But the best way is to experience it yourself
about_a1: The only time-tested, thematic burger restoraunt, which has rightfully become a cultural place in Rivne. This long journey would not be possible, if not our love to eat burgers every day. And true love is for life!
about_a2: Do you remember the scene from «Pulp Fiction» where Jules greedily eats someone else's burger? Thanks to that, we got and idea to combine two most important types of art: cinematography and street food.
about_a3: Visit us for a few minutes, put your thoughts on pause, and immerse yourself in the interesting film universe of black humor, under the crunch of a half-kilogram burger and a glass of beer!
